line_1: An humble, pious heart for th' offering;
line_2: Nay, it is well if he himself can bring

line_1: Their Hearts, their All, a Free-will Offering;
line_2: They, in those Days, unto our Sex did bring

line_1: When of my Love I make an Offering,
line_2: With Flames less pure then pious Vestals bring,
